messages.petDisposedText: Dear master, you had been disrespectful to me, so I ran away. Better be nice to your future pet Your Pet
messages.bodyButton: Hello! I am Doctor Alan Chogreen. Do you want to have your own pet ? If you do, you are at the right place. I will help you to build it. Select a shape and a color for your pet
messages.topButton: Looking for some ears? Here they are
messages.sideButton: Any paws or wings for your pet ? Use your imagination and don't forget to color them
messages.bottomButton: And the last – legs. Congrats! Name your pet then click Buy a Pet button and let me continue my experiments… See ya!
messages.badName: Bad name. Please, try another one
messages.petIsHungry: Dear master, I am hungry! Please come back to me and give me something to eat! Or else I will run away
